Phrase: The ever-darkness enveloped the entire Metro Hole area. All lighting fixtures normally used as tools were rendered unusable. We continued on through a darkness so thick that even light sources used by those who are good at magic, such as Vivienne and Yoshino, were almost completely absorbed.
Versailles and Miyako, who were walking at the front of the group, seemed to have a rough idea of the location of the monsters that might be the source of the Phantom Mist.

The two Metro natives were not afraid of the Nacht. Seeing their dependable gait, the Train Knights of Iris Cloud were convinced that all the stories about the girls walking alone through the unknown tunnels of the Metro Hole were true.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: This area is the darkest. The source of the outbreak is right under our noses. Everyone, prepare for a surprise attack.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: I have no idea which direction we're going...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Miss Versailles, Miss Miyako, do you two know where the Mist Train is?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Don't worry. I remember. It's alright, I can guide everybody as long as we don't get separated.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: You are a reliable ally. Paddington's memory is unfortunately not going to be able to do much good if she can't even see anything here.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Hawawa, I'm so sorry. You're right, I can't input in total darkness. It's an excellent tactic to exploit my weakness. It's quite a monster to be reckoned with.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: No, I don't think it's exploiting your weaknesses.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: ...Quiet. Everyone stop where you are.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: What's wrong? I don't feel anything.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I can see something up ahead... I sense a shadow.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: How far away is it?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Fifteen to twenty paces from where I am now. It is standing directly in front of us and staring at us. We're in engagement distance. Stay alert.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Yoshino, what do you see?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yoshino can't see anything, can't feel anything.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Versailles, can we leave the lights on? If they can see us from the other side, we could turn them off.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Non! Never turn off the lights!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Ou, oui...

Name: Versailles
Phrase: If you turn off the lights, we are finished. Not only will you be deprived of light, but also of sound and smell. You won't be able to join your companions and you will wander alone in eternal darkness.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Versailles, calm down. They're not people from Metro. You're scaring them talking like that.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: My apologies, Vivienne. I was too harsh.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: It's okay. I understand. Don't worry about it.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: It's our fault for not explaining first.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Remember this. Never turn off the lights when you are in the ever-darkness. If there is no light, then do not turn it on from the beginning.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: It's not good to turn off a light once it's on?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: 'Yes. It is rare for anyone in the Metro Railway Army or the Railway Knights to be unaware of this rule, as there has never been a time when a light has been switched off in ever-darkness and no one has died.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: If even one light remains, you can rest assured that you may be safe. But it is possible for all the lights to go out at any moment. The person who magically lit the lamps is responsible for keeping them alight.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Affrimative. I will defend it to the death.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: So, Miss Versailles, have you seen any movement in the shadows?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Non, it is still standing in the same place. I can't see its face, but the direction of its body indicates that it is still looking at us.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: What's wrong, Versailles? You've never said you can see something when I can't feel anything, have you?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I don't know, but it's right there. I can see it.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: How tall is the silhouette?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: About the same as Miss Queensway. I'd say of average female build.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Miss Versailles, do you know of any of your missing companions who are of a similar build?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: There was one. She was a friend of mine from our Knighthood Academy, a very brave knight.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Come to think of it, you have the same haircut as her. Right down to the sword at her waist...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: ...No more. Do not think about that person anymore.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: What...?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: You are in the enemy's trap. If you walk up to her, you will be swallowed up by darkness.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Oh, non, I am perfectly normal. I can at least distinguish between the Mist and the illusion.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: No, you are not normal. How can you distinguish only by sight in the darkness when you can't see anything? At first you didn't tell us anything about the details of the hair or the weapon its carrying.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Snap out of it. It may be difficult to tell you not to think about it, but Miss Versailles, you are projecting your fellow friend into this darkness.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Now, say it into words. Who is the person next to you?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Miyako. Sorceress of the M. Nishiki Railway Army...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: What is the reason you are here?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: To seek help from the Divine Children of Iris Cloud... To clear this abominable Nacht.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Now, look forward again. Do you see anything in this ever-darkness?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Non, I don't see anything. Just total darkness.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Then what was I looking at?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: It's alright. This often happens inside the Phantom Mist. We too have been in danger many times in Iris Cloud.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: It's hard to recognise yourself when you've been caught in the cracks of the heart. I understand that you feel responsible, but always listen to what your colleagues have to say.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Would you say we are your friends?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: No, we're already friends.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Well, provided we don't become enemies in the future.

Name: Mary
Phrase: The atmosphere's changed. Something powerful is coming towards us.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: I don't like this feeling. It's surrounding us, slowly approaching.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Mary, Mr. Conductor. Can I have a serious word with you?
Whenever you have serious words, Islington, is when something bad is happening. I have a bad feeling about this, but let's hear it out.

Name: Islington
Phrase: This thing that's after us, it's out of our league. If we fight it head on, we'll all die.
But we can't run away. We're already engaged. We're trapped like rats now. The only way to create an opening is to fight.

Name: Islington
Phrase: He may be what caused the Phantom Mist, he's not breathing it out directly. If he was, it wouldn't be at this level.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: This monster is the cause of the disturbance, but it's not the source of the Phantom Mist.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Exactly. Yoshino is right.

Name: Putra
Phrase: I understanding absolutely nothing right now.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: At any rate, it doesn't change the fact that it's all his fault, does it?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That's a yes.

Name: Islington
Phrase: This monster isn't causing the Mist. It's just that this thing's proximity to the Metro Hole is causing Celestial Sphere anomalies and dangerous black mist.

Name: Islington
Phrase: It's an existential evil. The very magic it emits is having an adverse effect on this place. It's like the Poison of Iris Cloud.

Name: Mary
Phrase: So you're saying something far more evil than people could have imagined has awakened in this world?
You are the Divine Child of the Iridescent Clouds. Why have you come to this world?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: The enemy!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: It's real this time. I can't see him clearly, but...

Name: King of Ever-Darkness
Phrase: I am the King of Ever-Darkness. I am the one who lurks in the underground Nacht.

Name: King of Ever-Darkness
Phrase: I will turn this whole world into ever-darkness. From the Mists and clouds I draw dark power to bring about eternal night.

Name: King of Ever-Darkness
Phrase: Do not touch the Guardians of the Giant Trees. The Divine Child of the Iridescent Clouds obtaining the Power of Clear Lands is enough.

Name: King of Ever-Darkness
Phrase: Stay away from the darkness of night and clouds, and then we will be able to coexist.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: What is he talking about? How can we coexist with this...?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: What does the Power of Clear Lands have to do with the Children of the Clear Lands?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Thinking that the Mistism cultists had said something like that.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: So such a being exists here. No wonder the Nacht still continued on...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: We're powerless. This is not even a demon anymore.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: How... What should we do? Versailles?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Dammit...

Name: Versailles
Phrase: O' King of Ever-darkness! Please, I beg you to listen to me!

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Will you please leave this land? Will you please leave us alone?

Name: King of Ever-Darkness
Phrase: Do not tell me what to do, puny dwarf. I decide where to build up my strength.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I am not giving an order, but a suggestion. There is too much light here. Look at the number of celestial spheres here that are lit. If you spread ever-darkness here, the harmony of the world will be greatly disturbed. I don't know what it is you want, but this is not the place for Nacht.

Name: Islington
Phrase: What a gambler. People don't even exaggerate that much too.

Name: Mary
Phrase: But it's working. Perhaps it's not a bluff, but the truth.

Name: King of Ever-Darkness
Phrase: Humans are foolish and short-lived creatures. They will never reach our realm.

Name: King of Ever-Darkness
Phrase: Can thy escape this darkness? Thy want to talk light, but can thy see enough to tell me the light?

Name: King of Ever-Darkness
Phrase: Show me thy strength. If thy can take even one step forward through this darkness. I will gather strength again in another land.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: The lights have gone out!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Non, I can't turn the lights on anymore. I can't use magic to replace the lights!

Name: Versailles
Phrase: We don't need the lights anymore. Even if we could, we shouldn't rely on them.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: We must break through this ever-darkness on our own. Let's bring back the light. The Nacht is over!

Name: Putra
Phrase: Gosh, something's coming...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: But it's not as scary as the one before.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: So he wants us to fight him. Bring it on.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Sir Conductor, Lady Islington, please cover us. SSS, lend us your support too!
